definition.name: Maven Dependency Tree Dependency Submission
definition.description: A GitHub Action for Maven project to submit a complete dependency tree to populate the GitHub Dependency Graph
definition.author: actions

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: The directory that contains the maven project

inputs.name: settings-file
inputs.description: Optional path to a Maven settings.xml file for the dependencies to be resolved

inputs.name: ignore-maven-wrapper
inputs.description: Flag for optionally ignoring any maven wrapper files (mvnw) and instead rely on the PATH provided mvn

inputs.name: maven-args
inputs.description: Additional maven arguments to add to the command line invocation of maven when it generates the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: The GitHub token to use to submit the depedency snapshot to the repository

inputs.name: snapshot-sha
inputs.description: The SHA that the results will be linked to in the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: snapshot-ref
inputs.description: The ref that the results will be linked to in the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: detector-name
inputs.description: The name of the detector that generated the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: detector-version
inputs.description: The version of the detector that generated the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: detector-url
inputs.description: The URL to the detector that generated the dependency snapshot

inputs.name: correlator
inputs.description: An optional identifier to distinguish between multiple dependency snapshots of the same type
